```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
require(tidyverse, quietly = TRUE)
require(foieGras, quietly = TRUE)
```

### Infer movement persistence along SSM-filtered southern elephant seal tracks
```{r fit SSM and MPM, eval=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
fit <- fit_ssm(sese, vmax=4, model="crw", time.step=24, control=ssm_control(verbose=0, se=FALSE))

fmp <- fit_mpm(fit, what = "predicted", model = "jmpm", control = mpm_control(verbose = 0))

save(fit,fmp, file = "../data/ex33_fmp.RData", compress="xz")
```


### visualise movement persistence in 1-D time-series plots
```{r mp time-series plots}
load("../data/ex33_fmp.RData")
plot(fmp, pages = 1, ncol=2, ask=0, pal = "Cividis")

```

### map movement persistence along animal tracks
```{r map mp}
fmap(fit, fmp, what = "p", crs = "+proj=stere +lon_0=70 +units=km +datum=WGS84 +no_defs", pal="Cividis")
```
